column6: Would you recommend C&BSco to your friends and family? (Score 0-10)

column12: Their soaps make me feel radiant

column11: The customer service is terrible, I licked one soap to see if it was 'banana' as advertised, and I got kicked out

column12: Their products are 100% natural (pure olive oil soap lover)
I found out the olives we're from Greece
I love that you have soaps smelling like ginger beer
great for my slip and slide
Cleans perfectly and isn't too slippery

column11: Out, damned spot! out, I say! Will these hands ne'er be clean? Here's the smell of the blood still: all the perfumes of Chin Beard and Suds Co will not sweeten this little hand.

column12: Wonderfully fragranced soaps. They always delight my guests. Such a pity that you discontinued my favourite smell though!

column11: Smells great but I can't get it out of my hair!!!
